## Block.goRow() method

Navigates to a specific row.

**Signature:**

```typescript
goRow(row: number): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  row | number | The row number to navigate to. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

A promise that resolves to a boolean indicating the success of the operation.
